description: A turn-based RPG about a skeleton who sets out to take back an unjust, institutionalized mage tower, with the help of some fairly likely allies.

name: Ooga
description: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!

name: Super Retro BoxBot
description: 1990s-style puzzle gameplay inspired by the DOS classics Block-man and Loader Larry, Super Retro BoxBot is sure to entertain and challenge you through its hand-crafted levels! You can also create your very own challenges with the included level editor! Put your puzzle-solving skills to the test!

name: Tiny Hero Idle
description: "Tiny Hero Idle": An Idle RPG on PC that allows simultaneous play with other games. Join a unique adventure with daily rewards and cool actions

name: Shooting Donut
description: "Shooting Donut" is an addictive puzzle game with 100 diverse stages, where you shoot donuts to break blocks. Utilize 4 items strategically for precise aiming and level clearance.

name: Homebrew32
description: Drawn into your PC by a mysterious antivirus, control a 1-5 barrel tank. Navigate the motherboard, defeating boss viruses to unlock new zones. The 'UPGRADE MACHINE' grants enhancements every 1-10 seconds. Use points from previous runs to upgrade it and gain an edge.

name: Night Raider
description: Night Raider is a thrilling adventure exploration shooter game. Players need to carry weapons into the city occupied by zombies, as far as possible in various buildings to collect necessary supplies, evacuate alive to bring supplies back to the camp. But you have to face are not just zombies...

name: Maze!
description: Maze! is a top-down 2D indie game featuring minimalist visuals and procedurally generated mazes. Choose from four different algorithms, customize maze sizes to your liking, and race against time for high scores.

name: Super Cloud Fight
description: Super Cloud Fight elevates aerial combat to new heights! Engage in thrilling dogfights, unleash epic maneuvers from your biplane in a sky-bound battleground. Dive into clouds for cover, seize power-ups, and dominate the skies to become the ultimate airborne champion!

name: Rogue Slime
description: Rogue Slime: An engaging isometric 2D roguelike adventure where you maneuver a slime character through dynamic dungeons, utilizing slime ball attacks and a variety of power-ups to overcome diverse enemies and evolving challenges.

name: Wizdom Academy
description: Lead a wizard school in 3D, recruit students and staff, manage resources, and solve the mystery of severe mana droughts in Wizdom Academy. Engage in deep interactions with AI characters and thrive in this magical adventure !

name: Envelope
description: Envelope is a psychological thriller game that puts you in the shoes of an unfortunate soul who finds himself getting pushed to do something beyond anything he could possibly imagine.

name: Party Pirates
description: Party Pirates is a couch co-op game where players become clumsy pirates traveling from port to port, taking on dangerous foes and sea monsters along the way. Gather your crew, don an eyepatch, and do everything to keep your ship afloat!

name: Wild West Saloon
description: Howdy partner! In Wild West Saloon you manage and maintain your own saloon. Serve drinks, cook food, clean tables and most importantly keep your customers happy.

name: SysOps Saga
description: SysOps Saga is a simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), managing the intricate web of software, security, and hardware to keep digital systems running. Developed by a FAANG veteran, this game offers an immersive and educational experience for IT enthusiasts.

name: Deep Dive Duet
description: You and your partner find yourself deep underwater in a sinking submarine. Your goal is to swim as far as possible. Stay on course, repair holes, don't let electrical wires fall into the water and try not to die in a closed, flooded compartment.

name: Don't Press A to Jump
description: An endless runner for the Playdate console

name: NanoApostle
description: NanoApostle is a dark sci-fi boss rush action game featuring intense reaction-based combat and the unique "Destruction Point" system. Play as Anita, a child augmented with lethal nanomachines, as she battles against twisted cybernetic experiments to escape a top-secret facility.

name: Intruder Alert
description: Intruder Alert is an action-stealth 2D adventure combined with multiple other genres packed into a single game. Stealthily avoid other shapes, defeat them when necessary, and complete various tasks along your journey.

name: Psychiatrist Simulator 2
description: Take role as Dr. Smith, psychotherapist. Game consists of real people video recordings. Talk with them, treat, learn about psychology. Your choices have consequences, at the end you will see what happened in their life after meeting with you.

name: Merchant Isle
description: Ship wrecked on an island, establish your merchant empire from the ground up. Buy and sell items, negotiate prices, invest in businesses, and establish trade routes. Explore ancient ruins for high worth relics. Claw your way up to the top of the merchant guild!

name: Corridor VR
description: Welcome to a mind-bending virtual reality experience like no other. Dive into a captivating puzzle platformer where reality is not what it seems. In this thrilling VR game, players wield the extraordinary power to shift seamlessly between two parallel worlds: the normal world and the mirror world.

name: More Orke
description: Orc-themed idle war game. Use planning and wit to grow your empire and eradicate all who stand in your way!

name: The Dabloon Project
description: An Exploration/Adventure game set in a procedural map. Fight, Explore, and Build to become comfortable with your Dabloon fortune.

name: OG Memory: Fall 2K23
description: OG Memory: Fall 2K23 is an casual memory game with stunning leafs images made in Fall 2023. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Gallery Night Shift
description: Work the night shift with your friends at a gallery where the art wants to kill you.

name: Planecraft
description: Planecraft is a 2.5D Sandbox game. Build your settlement on the surface map where you grow crops and tend to your livestock or let your settlers do that for you. Explore multiple levels of dungeons below, the depper you go, the better the resources you can find.

name: Oil Coin
description: A game in which you need to explore new oil fields. For this you will have different ways, such as moles, geologists and so on. Build towers, oil storages, pump your production, improve buildings and warehouses. Hire workers, guards, fight off or buy off raiders. Buy new lands.

name: The Backrooms Regret
description: Are you prepared to survive in this hostile world? Uncover who you are and how you ended up in this dimension. But don't worry, the warm company that accompanies you will make your experience much "more pleasant". Oh, and good luck, you will need it.

name: Desert Kingdoms
description: Desert Kingdoms is a minimal real time strategy game. Protect your king and conquer the desert.

name: Star Ship Survivor
description: Player move ship and dock with blocks. This docking will be on contacted position, so your ship can be ugly shap. But if your control was good at moving ship, your ship will be cool. Try this trip and survive. And if you can, try making cool shape ship.

name: Orbius
description: Orbius is a suika-like, rogue-lite casual game where the goal is to get the highest score possible. As your score rises, you must select spells that make furthering the game more and more difficult. Will you master Orbius?

name: A Kingdom to Conquer
description: A Kingdom to Conquer is 2D tactical action RPG where you play as a weak monster, clawing your way up the food chain. Do what you must to survive. Fight. Bargain. Run. Evolve, lead armies, raid monasteries and conquer kingdoms...

name: Bubble Wrap
description: The simple and fun way to relax!

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange
description: Set out on an adventurous journey, searching for capybaras with orange during both day and night in this exceptional hidden object game.

name: Sanity's Shroud
description: Sanity's Shroud, a first person survival horror experience tailored to your fears.

name: The Phoenix Protocol
description: The Phoenix Protocol is an action-roguelike game set in a cyberpunk world that is easy to learn but hard to master with a focus on complex mechanics with a lot of depth.

name: Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing
description: The Sweet Science Meets The STREETS!

name: Fluffwatch
description: Fluffwatch is a time management, casual, and, cozy game about taking care of a herd of sheep during cozy day and defending them during stressful night from hungry wolves. Make wonderful connections with the animals you take care of and let nothing take them away from you!

name: Castle of Lord Velimir
description: Epic battle against encroaching darkness. It is a baby from Warcraft 3, Dark Souls and Super Mario bros. Don't ask, it was wild party.

name: The Outforce
description: In the 25th century, humanity fights for survival, having abandoned Earth due to a devastating asteroid impact. They now strive to settle in Epsilon Eridani, a nearby star system. Upon reaching their destination, the colonists find themselves entangled in an unforeseen intergalactic conflict.

name: Sonia no Daibouken: Mittsu no Hihou no Kakusareta Nazo!
description: Sin descripción

name: I Keep Dying in Another World
description: Fantasy Murder Mystery Isekai Kinetic Novel featuring a variety of girls, comedy, despair, and deaths in an exciting story!

name: Yuusha no Densetsu no Yuusha
description: Sin descripción

name: My Universe Collection
description:
In this bundle, find 3 games from the My Universes series, including:

My Universe : My Baby - a realistic baby simulation. Time to become a parent! Take care of your newborn boy or girl, keep them happy and help them learn new skills.

My Universe : Interior Designer - become the most renowned interior designer in town and create your dream home..

My Universe : School Teacher - become the best teacher in town! Play as a young teacher with a mission: bringing your new school back to the top!

name: Moonstone Island: December Lovely Cozies
description:
- 1 New House Skin
- Snowman House
- 1 New Rug 2
- New Snowmen
- 1 New Snowboard
- 4 Icicle Variations

name: Dark Forest
description: You searching for secret treasure.You being confronted by mysterious creatures, guards and gods.The only way to get away is to destroy everything stands against you.A forest in darkness which had been kept secret, protected and laid the in middle of internal conflict. You ready for the adventure?

name: Journey to the Wand
description: "Journey to the Wand" is a delightful experience for those interested in platform games. The struggle to retrieve Elowen's wand will offer players a unique adventure, and the captivating story of the game will immerse players from beginning to end.

name: JK Puzzle
description: JK Puzzle, a very simple puzzle game.

name: Ycom
description: Have you ever wondered what is it like to be a elite snowballer? Well look no further Ycom is game for you.

name: Goi Survivors
description: Humans, dwarves, and elves exploring diverse landscapes and dungeons, they combine their unique abilities in trios to combat mythical creatures and uncover ancient relics, striving to aid the goddess to cleanse the realm of malevolent forces.

name: Moratorium: Don’t Beat This Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Sakura Succubus 8
description: The eighth part of the Sakura Succubus series is finally here! Join Hiroki and his loyal harem as they try to help Alice overcome her greatest challenge yet: trying to find a job.

name: Backrooms
description: The Backrooms is an Online Co-Op experience with friends, dynamic levels, and proximity voice chat. Every second week new level will be added! Or create your own levels with the in-game level editor! Face the unknown together, communicating strategically in this immersive and chilling adventure.

name: Christmas Girls
description: It's Christmas time! Everyone is looking forward to it, including our girls! They have already put on their Christmas hats, so they are ready!

name: Escape the Super Nerdy Dungeon: W100 Master Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: To the Hall of the Mountain King
description: 3D hack and slash platforming action adventure in which your mission is to rescue your cat and carry out a coup against the king who ordered cat's abduction.

name: Separated Worlds
description: Go to the dungeons and find out where it leads. On the way you will meet a lot of creatures from different worlds. Maybe we should find out where they came from?

name: Mecha Break
description: Mecha Break is a multiplayer mech game that allows players to choose from diverse mechs, customize appearances, and battle colossal war machines on treacherous terrain. Get ready for the ultimate showdown—blitz, brawl, blaze!

name: Mallion
description: Play the game from the perspective of a traveler who comes to the dealer and is faced with numerous choices in a story prepared by the dealer. Experience a story that changes based on your choices and see the ending that changes based on your choices!

name: Sands of Salzaar: Land of the Eclipse
description: This DLC includes three expansion contents: "The Eclipse Hive", "Exotic Wayfarer", and "Siege and Conquest"; each can be loaded/removed independently in the game.

name: Space Frontier
description: As a space refugee, you finally found a planet with environment suitable to settle. Craft equipments and build a settlement for you and your group. Craft, build, and supply to survive in the space.

name: Whispers of the Sands
description: Survive a unforgiving desert, hear the whispers of the sands and find sanctuary in caves. Through meditation, unlock an inner world to explore and gain insights and abilities.

name: Super Liftpia
description: Pick up the enemy and throw it! This is an action game drawn with dots that gives you a nostalgic feel.

name: Girls of the Tower
description: This is a Rogue-like game with a combination of JRPG, auto chess, and galgame elements. Players can choose from two different female protagonists to embark on a unique adventure. Additionally, players can recruit followers, strategize their formations, and develop their town!

name: Cole Dingo's Vtuber Blackjack
description: You like streaming? You like blackjack? Cole Dingo's Vtuber BlackJack is a game where you can play blackjack on stream with your audience with you as the dealer!

name: Timeout Bistro
description: The player be a store manager and runs a bistro. He could design the daily menu and create the perfect marriage between the wine and food.

name: Power Fantasy: Krampus Night
description: It's Krampus Night and Santas little helpers got corrupted. Help Santa Claus to end the curse and save Christmas!

name: Christmas Wonderland 14: Collector's Edition
description: Enjoy an exciting Christmas Wonderland and Happy Holidays in Springfield. Help Santa at his North Pole Workshops. Fly in his brand New Sleigh. Visit Santa's Amazing Virtual Reality Grotto. Take part making a Movie.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension V Pack
description: Meet the 'V Original Music' package now!

name: Shadow Gambit: Yuki's Wish
description: Yuki and Kuma from Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun return! Recruit them to your pirate crew, explore the enchanted Japanese island “Dragon's Dream”, and experience six new story missions. Will you solve the dragon's riddle and fulfill Yuki's wish?

name: Headbangers: Fright or Flight
description: Your Headbanger has never looked so good! Grab the Fright or Flight DLC and show off your new drip to all your friends or dazzle the competition.

name: Dream Sketcher: The Lost Opera
description: This DLC includes 1 new script The Lost Opera, 1 new investigator "Mercenary" Diana, and 30 new cards.

name: Tales of Arise: Elegant Costume Pack
description: The Elegant Costume Pack contains costumes and attachments for Alphen and Shionne, exclusive cooking recipes, and food items.

name: Shadow Gambit: Zagan's Ritual
description: "Zagan the Apostate" is inviting you to his ominous laboratory. Recruit the zealous scientist and former Inquisition member to your crew, set sail to an eldritch castle island and experience a new campaign. Will you unveil the secrets of the Inquisition's holy flame?

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Happy Holidays 2023
description: Spread the cheer and make this holiday season extra special in our winter wonderland!

name: Lotus Simulator: Citybus Hamburg
description: Take over bus route 172 in Hamburg, Germany. Set in 2005 with authentic low floor transit bus models, realistic buildings and streets and 1100 unique scenery objects. Also included in this Lotus Simulator DLC: new AI vehicles and vegetation.

name: Umbrella Girl
description: Umbrella Girl is a 2D belt-scroll action adventure game. You can enjoy various actions through the character's type transformation, and become the main character to free citizens from acid rain.

name: Phantom Girls: Ghostbuster
description: Immerse yourself in "Phantom Girls: Ghostbuster", an adult FPS horror game where sensuality meets horror. Go through explicit scenes and supernatural phenomena immersed in the story of a ghostbuster.

name: Love, in Debt!?
description: Love, In Debt!? is a romance simulation game. You once had a beautiful relationship, but overnight you were fired, cheated on, and even got yourself in a huge debt! In order to survive, all you can do is work tirelessly! But why does it seem like you became a chick magnet after you're in debt?

name: White Lilies Code
description: You’re an average electronic technician. You live in a big city. You’ve a lot of work. You’re tired so it’s high time to have a vacation. But… a chain of sudden events puts you in an incredible adventure.

name: LoveXLust
description: Welcome to LoveXLust, where desire steals the spotlight! Immerse yourself in the ultimate VR adventure that's more than just a game, where you can unlock your deepest fantasies and experience love, lust, and endless excitement. Dive in, and let your desires come to life!

name: Dude Simulator Six
description: Dude Simulator Six is an open world sandbox game. A mortal danger looms over humanity. The planet was invaded by representatives of a distant planetary system.

name: Warehouse Seduction
description: Warehouse Seduction is a warehouse worker simulator blended with a VN full of sexy and adult content renders and animations.

name: Lovely Defenders
description: A group of legendary monsters is said to silently invade bedrooms while girls are fast asleep, stealthily stealing their precious belongings. As the commander, you will assist the girls in reclaiming these stolen items!

name: TryAndLove
description: A man's life is a life of pursuing love. The childish love of childhood sweethearts? White Moonlight's pure love? Ignorant of the astringent love of forbidden fruit? Blind love like a moth flying into a flame? True love that transcends the world? Act Ren Xing and make a willful choice.

name: Pok The Little Artiste
description: PC game by Living Media and Arborescence.

name: Planetary Taxi
description: Educational CD-ROM for Windows 3.1 and Macintosh.

name: Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew
description: "Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew" is a 2D story-based turn-based game developed by an individual. In the game, you will assume the role of "Dew", and encounter a variety of characters, confront the looming threat of the dark beasts, face the ultimate evil, and ultimately fight for goodness and freedom.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: Epic Roller Coasters and Nickelodeon bring you the most phenomenal roller coaster combo ever in the funniest place across the ocean.

name: Just Survive
description: The world is looking for a new hero!

name: Rendsword
description: The roguelike deckbuilding word game.

name: Fighter Aircraft Race
description:
Epic Skyward Duels Await!

Dive into "Fighter Aircraft Race" – where high-speed aerial races meet thrilling local 2-player battles! Navigate treacherous skies, outmaneuver your rival, and flaunt your superior piloting prowess.

name: Six Minute Showdown
description: Six Minute Showdown is an unique DOOM II map by Vytaan featuring rhytmic elements. The map responds to the music's beat and will end at exactly six minutes, it requires quick reaction time as well as developed combat skills to keep up the pace.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 21
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 21 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 22
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 22 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 23
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 23 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 24
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 24 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 25
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 25 has arrived with this update.

name: Tails Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 26
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 26 has arrived with this update.

name: Amazing Penguin DX
description: Another DMG classic joins the DX colorization crew! Enjoy this Natsume’s little addictive gem now in full color for the first time!

name: Cellofania
description: Sin descripción

name: Snoopy's Magic Show DX
description: No one asked for it, but here it goes! Snoopy’s Magic Show is a total classic for the DMG, a very simple yet addictive single-screen arcade now in full color!

name: Project Chameleon
description: Project Chameleon is a stealth game where you must shape-shift into objects to go unnoticed by your enemies. Play as Siren, an elite spy executing missions around the globe. Manipulate your surroundings, set traps, and use powerful gadgets in each mission.

name: Hey Ma I'm a Dragon Now
description: A Single Player 2D Side-Scrolling pixel art Skill-Based Bullet-Hell Game where you kill various enemies and bosses to get coins to upgrade your character so you can beat more enemies and progressed further.

name: PSXFunkin'
description: This is a homebrew PSone port of Friday Night Funkin'.

name: Santa's Factory
description:
This holiday, there're too many good kids in the world. As usual, good kids will get a present from Santa in this holiday. But before that, you gotta help Santa to wrap all the presents.

In Santa's Factory, there's no room for one mistake. Your job is to deliver each present to the correct place. Press [Left] or [Right] to move the pipe, then press [A Button] to push the present into the box. If you create a single mistake (Misplacing the present or one present got skipped) you will break Santa's Factory and many kids hearts since they didn't get any present.

name: Sailor Moon RevengeX
description:
Queen Metalia is planning to control planet Earth, and Sailor Moon must prevent it to save all forms of life, accompany Serena in this amazing battle.

Detailed and musicalized in the Sailor Moon cartoon, a video game that every true anime and PS2 fans can't help but enjoy.

name: Super Smash Bros. Clash
description:
Super Smash Bros Clash is a 2D beat em up homebrew for the NDS.

It was created by former members from the Super Smash Bros Rumble project.

name: Danger City
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Kitty no Happy Accessory
description: A PSP Hello Kitty game.

name: Amazona Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Eisadler Jagd
description: Sin descripción

name: Wipeout 2600
description:
An Atari 2600 demake of the iconic futuristic racer by Psygnosis / SCE Studio Liverpool.

Steer with the joystick, avoid the other racers, or shoot them with your missiles. Speed up with the speed boosts and refill the clock with the energy points.

name: Wall-E
description:
Hey kids, do you like Wall-E? You do? Then great news! Now you can help Wall-E clean up trash on your Atari 2600!

Go around the junkyard and clean up all that garbage, but watch out! Electrical storms are brewing and if Wall-E is hit, he shuts down.

name: Hello Kitty no 'Otonaru' Mail
description: Hello Kitty no 'Otonaru' Mail is a Japan-only Hello Kitty Dreamcast game. It has online functions that allow users to communicate with friends by sending mail using Hello Kitty characters.

name: AE Mini Game Collection
description:
Four minigames includes:

- Breakout.
- Firemen.
- Maze game.
- Invaders DS.

name: Hello Kitty no Hiragana Katakana Onamae Kaitemiyou
description: A Hello Kitty Advanced Pico Beena game.

name: The Shape of Us
description: A VR journey that brings you closer to Nature. You’ll use your whole body on the way – prepare to stretch, crawl, rest, dance, feel!

name: Hello Kitty no Sutekina Otanjoubi
description: A Japan-only Sega Pico Hello Kitty game.

name: Newly-wedded Woman Stealing Life
description:
Yukino has a boyfriend named Makoto whom she promised to marry.
However, Makoto is a man from a good family and they refuse the marriage with Yukino.
Then, Makoto's uncle, Masao, comes up with a deal. He would arrange things to make the marriage possible if Yukino agreed to spend a night with him.
Yukino hesitantly accepts the condition.
However, it's the beginning of a devastating life...

name: Hello Kitty no Tanoshii Omiseyasan
description: A Sega Pico game based on Sanrio's Hello Kitty franchise.

name: Alex Kidd in Pico World
description: Remember Alex Kidd in Miracle World for the Sega Master System? Now it's crunched down to 64x64 for the Pico-8 Fantasy Console! This miniaturised version of the game features everything from the original game - recreated in the limitations of Pico-8!

name: Hello Kitty Racing Adventures
description: Get your hands on the wheel, step on the gas and be ready to jump! The cutest cartoon crew is waiting for you - Hello Kitty, Chococat, Pompompurin, Kerokerokeroppi, Gudetama, Little Twin Stars, Cinnamoroll, Kuromi, Tuxedosam, Bad Badtz-Maru and My Melody.

name: Hello Kitty Jewel Town
description: Hello Kitty Jewel Town! is a match 3 game where players help Hello Kitty join colored gems and break them.

name: Hello Kitty Detective Games
description: A Hello Kitty mobile game.

name: Hello Kitty Discovering The World
description: A mobile Hello Kitty game.

name: Pic-Man
description: A Pac-Man clone for PICO-8. You control Pic and your goal is to eat all pills to win the maze.

name: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons Remake
description: Guide two brothers on an epic journey of discovery, loss, adventure and mystery remade for the latest generation of graphics, performance, and gameplay. Play in single-player mode or local co-op with a friend. This is one journey you will never forget.

name: Pony Island 2: Panda Circus
description: Pony Island 2: Panda Circus is a phantasmagorical voyage through time, myth, divinity, and video games. Escape the lordly deities of the underworld with your soul, and your sanity, intact. This is not a game about ponies.

name: The Rise of the Golden Idol
description: The Award-winning detective saga returns. Uncover the truth behind 20 strange cases of crime, death and depravity in the 1970s. The world has changed dramatically - the sins of humanity have not.

name: Usual June
description: Hang out, fight monsters, and discover your town’s darkest secrets in Usual June, a third person action game about summer break and the end of the world.

name: Harmonium: The Musical
description: Harmonium is an interactive sign language musical and adventure/narrative game that follows Melody Macato, an energetic 10-year-old Filipina-American musician who became Deaf at a young age. For her upcoming debut show, she wants to create a new type of music that can be felt, seen, and is accessible to her friends.

name: Windblown
description: Brave the Vortex and dash your way to greatness in this lightning-fast action roguelike from the creators of Dead Cells. Alone or in coop, become the ultimate killing machine as you enhance your skills and master your weapons in search of that perfect run.

name: Thrasher
description: Thrasher is a mind-melting cosmic racer and an essential audiovisual experience. Swoop, dash and thrash across the void, taking on wild bosses in a race for survival that begins at the dawn of time.

name: Dave the Diver: Dredge
description:
Encounter charactes and aberrations from the enigmatic fishing adventure game DREDGE, in Dave the Diver!

Turn aberrant fish into sushi to feed the hooded figures!

On days when the red fog rolls in you can take direct control of the boat and go to the aberrant fish habitat!

name: World of Goo 2
description: Use living liquid creatures to build bridges, grow towers, terraform terrain, and fuel flying machines. The world is beautiful, dangerous, and evolving.

name: Exodus
description: Exodus is an epic new sci-fi action-adventure RPG franchise developed by the team at Archetype Entertainment. The story is fueled by the consequences of player choices due to the impact of Time Dilation and how they change the lives of those we love most.

name: God of War Ragnarök: Valhalla
description: God of War Ragnarök: Valhalla is a free DLC that introduces a new mode that uses elements of the roguelite genre. Players progress through a series of trials set in procedurally generated levels, where they must choose a relic, shield, and rage ability for each trial run. After completing a challenge within a trial, players can opt for upgrading their weapon, relic, or stats, but these enhancements only apply to that specific trial run. Each run and the completion of specific gameplay challenges unlock permanent rewards. If a player dies, they restart the trial from the beginning. The downloadable content (DLC) also introduces new enemies, including new and familiar ones from the Greek era games like cyclopes and minotaurs.

name: Big Walk
description: Hang out and get lost with close friends in a big world. A cooperative online walker-talker from the creators of Untitled Goose Game.

name: Kemuri
description: Kemuri summons you into a realm where the unpredictable meets the extraordinary in an urban jungle where mysterious creatures - Yokai- hide amongst the population. Become a Yokai Hunter and use your Fox Window to unravel the mysteries of the city and bring balance to the world. Dive into a thrilling adventure alone or with friends, hunt yokai in style, collect their powers and face even greater challenges.

name: No Rest for the Wicked
description: From Moon Studios, the award-winning developers of Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps comes No Rest for the Wicked, a visceral, precision Action RPG set to reinvent the genre.

name: MLB Manager 2015
description: MLB Manager 2015 offers an all-star lineup of great new features, including 2015 Opening Day rosters, the ability to shop a player, career stats leaderboards, and much more!

name: Jet Set Radio
description: “Counter-culture”. Tokyo streets open world. Experience the “rebellion” movement that feels free in a suffocating society. Make friends, increase your fans, and create a movement!

name: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance
description: Slay the enemies in the silence of the moment. Run through the world of Shinobi full of monsters and ninja actions. Grab Oborozuki, the legendary sword, and slay evil once more. Your clan and the world are counting on you.

name: Golden Axe
description: Warriors arise to subdue the demons! Defeat your enemies with a variety of attacks with swords and magic! The legendary story about the battle axe “Golden Axe” is about to begin!

name: Streets of Rage: Revolution
description: Beloved side-scrolling beat ’em up action series! Take control of one of the ex-officers and make the city a place where people no longer have to walk the “Streets of Rage”!

name: Crazy Taxi
description: Innovative and fresh style driving action! Cheerful feeling of freedom x fusion of nature and city. Peel out the new stage of Crazy City!

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
description: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Make yours the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in Dragon Ball!

name: The Casting of Frank Stone
description: The shadow of Frank Stone looms over Cedar Hills, a town forever altered by his violent past. As a group of young friends are about to discover, Stone’s blood-soaked legacy cuts deep, leaving scars across families, generations, and the very fabric of reality itself.

name: Visions of Mana
description: For the first time in over 15 years, a brand-new entry in the mainline Mana series arrives! Embark on a new adventure with Val, the newly appointed soul guard, as he sets off on a journey across the world to accompany his friend on her pilgrimage to the Tree of Mana. Experience action-packed gameplay and explore a vibrant semi-open 3D field, encountering fearsome foes and unlikely allies along the way.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: OD
description: OD explores the concept of testing your fear threshold, and what it means to OD on fear – while blurring the boundaries of gaming and film.

name: Pet City
description: Sin descripción

name: Jurassic Park: Survival
description: Survive thrilling first-person action as InGen scientist Dr. Maya Joshi, who was unable to evacuate Isla Nublar, in this single-player action-adventure game and discover a never-before-told story. Through thrilling encounters, experience the wonder and danger of dinosaurs, each with their own distinct and adaptive behaviors brought to life by John Hammond’s vision.

name: Tales of Kenzera: Zau
description: Tales of Kenzera: Zau is a 2.5D metroidvania developed by Surgent Studios and published under the EA Originals label. The game follows Zau, a young shaman who bargains with Kalunga, the God of Death, to revive his father. Players explore the mythological lands of Kenzera, using Zau's athletic abilities—such as double jumping, wall jumping, and air dashing—to traverse the environment. Equipped with the sun mask for melee attacks and the moon mask for ranged combat, Zau can upgrade both weapons along distinct paths. As players gain new skills, they unlock previously inaccessible areas, progressing through a world filled with ancestral spirits and powerful monsters.

name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
description: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage is a brand-new story-driven journey through time from the creative minds behind Life is Strange. The magical summer of 1995 is one of self-discovery and forging unbreakable bonds for high school friends Swann, Nora, Autumn, and Kat. 27 years of no contact later, fate reunites them to confront the long-buried secret that made them promise to never speak again.

name: The First Berserker: Khazan
description: The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action role-playing game. The player will become Khazan, the great general of the Pelos empire, whom overcame death, and sets out to reveal the incidents that led to his downfall and seek vengeance on his enemies.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Crown of the Mundane and Divine
description:
Version 1.6 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Ruan Mei, Dr. Ratio and Xueyi
• New area: Herta Space Station - Seclusion Zone
• New Forgotten Hall stages
• Simulated Universe update
• New event: Pure Fiction
• …and more!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 1
description: Prepare for an incredible Season 1, bringing a massive drop of free and premium content, including five free weapons, four new Multiplayer maps, multiple modes, the next Zombies story mission, the arrival and integration of Call of Duty: Warzone and the new Urzikstan map, an all-new 100+ Tiers of Battle Pass content to earn, BlackCell, and more.

name: Marvel's Blade
description: In Marvel’s Blade, Eric Brooks is the legendary Daywalker, half-man, half-vampire torn between the warm society of the living and the rushing power of the undead. From Bethesda and Arkane Lyon, Marvel’s Blade is a mature, single-player, third-person game set in the heart of Paris, now in development in collaboration with Marvel Games.

name: Last Sentinel
description: Set decades from now in a reconstructed Tokyo, you play as Hiromi Shoda in Last Sentinel, a narrative-focused, open-world action game from Lightspeed Studios.

name: GTFO: The Final Chapter
description: Bringing the story of the four prisoners to an end in the most GTFO way possible. This time is different/same. The right/wrong place with the wrong/right people. How low/high will you/they go before you start/stop following orders? This is the end/beginning.

name: Den of Wolves
description: Den of Wolves is a co-op heist FPS from the creator of Payday: The Heist, Payday 2 and GTFO. In this techno-thriller you and your friends operate as criminals for hire in the conflicts between rival corporations in Midway City. Gather your crew, design the plan, gear up and execute the heist.

name: Exoborne
description: Exoborne is an open-world, tactical extraction shooter set in a world torn apart by extreme forces of nature. Customize powerful exo-rigs to gain strategic advantage in ever-changing weather conditions. Face hostile factions, enemy players, and Mother Nature herself in intense high-stakes sessions.

name: The Two Towers
description:
The Two Towers MUD is a free Multiplayer Online Roleplaying Game set entirely within Tolkien's world of Middle-earth, at the time of 'Lord of the Rings'. We have extensively re-created the lands of Middle-earth in a rich text environment, from Mithlond to Mordor and the lands of Harad beyond. With over 100,000 rooms and always growing, The Two Towers is a richly developed and highly interactive world. There are hundreds of quests, with rewards great and small, for you to discover.

The Two Towers has an active community of players from around the world who come together to play online. Players join together to create guilds, raid enemy lands, and more.

Online continuously since 1994, The Two Towers is one of the longest running multiplayer games on the internet and is maintained by a staff of hardworking volunteers who love Tolkien and multiplayer gaming.

name: Light No Fire
description: A game about adventure, building, survival and exploration together. Set on a fantasy planet the size of Earth.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 11: Elphelt Valentine
description: Elphelt is joining Guilty Gear: Strive!

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Echoes of the Fallen
description: Echoes of the Fallen is the first DLC of Final Fantasy XVI, which unlocks a whole new story, battles, weapons, accessories, level cap and more. For players who have completed the required quests, this new adventure begins before the base game’s final battle, as strange, dark crystals begin to circulate on the black market. Players will follow Clive and his friends during their investigations as they encounter a group of suspicious traders, leading them to a long-abandoned Fallen tower known as the Sagespire. There, they will unravel the terrible secrets that await within.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III
